ygData.subject: Re: Sense Magic Spell
ygData.msgSnippet: you could use the /feedback command in game to offer feedback ... From: Gary Long [mailto:glong@valley-internet.com] Sent: Wednesday, May 26, 1999 1:30 PM To:
ygData.messageBody:
you could use the /feedback command in game to offer feedback

-----Original Message-----
From: Gary Long [mailto:glong@...]
Sent: Wednesday, May 26, 1999 1:30 PM
To: eqpaladin@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [eqpaladin] Sense Magic Spell


From: Gary Long <glong@...>

In this paladin's opinion, sense magic is an utter waste of a spell slot
because:
a) flash of light increases divination
b) sense magic imparts no useful or new information about an item

At level 9 we *could*, however, use a conjuration or evocation based
spell,
however useless, simply as a way to build THOSE skills. I would write
to
Verant on this subject if I had their email address. Anybody have it?

Kaladin, Holy Warrior of Tunare (who senses nothing magical about the
'sense
magic' spell)

> From: David Rogers <derogers334@...>
>
> --- Tim West <twest@...> wrote:
> > Has anyone found a use for this spell yet ?
